welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pinagkaisahan, Philippines! Known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking mountains, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and enjoy all it has to offer. Let your adventure begin!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it primarily serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
